title: How to Make Sassy Water

steps.headline: Wash the citrus fruit before slicing.
Pour the water into a pitcher or large jug.
Add the plant ingredients.
steps.description: Cover the pitcher and place in the refrigerator. Leave overnight to infuse the flavors.

steps.headline: Drink the water the next day.
steps.description: If you're drinking this as part of a diet, follow the diet instructions. Otherwise, just enjoy this refreshing drink throughout the day.

steps.headline: Drink the next day as required.
